plot: With New York destroyed and Defiance at risk, Nolan must race against the clock to stop Irzu and save Irisa in the process.

The residents of Defiance worry about having lost all contact with New York. Some believe it is the work of the Voltanis Collective but Nolan knows otherwise. Doc Yewl has made it back to Defiance and confirms Nolan's story about the arkbrain. She also knows how to kill it - but that would also kill Irisa in the process. Nolan realizes that that it was having both keys inside Irisa that reactivated the Kaziri and so sets out to locate her and stop the destruction. Berlin meanwhile is is having trouble coming to terms with Tommy's death and puts the blame squarely on Irisa. Datak returns home, much to Alak's surprise. Christie's mother Pilar has her own plans for her daughter.—garykmcd
